entries.title_d: Nym has never liked the fact that the Empire has a base located on Lok. He is constantly hampering Imperial shipments heading into the system. With our current operations it is important that those shipments make it to the base without incident. You are to protect those shipments from attacks from Nym's men.
entries.title: Lok System: Bait and Destroy Nym's Pirates
entries.thanks_3: Don't get cocky. There are more pirates out there.
entries.thanks_2: Nice work, but there are always more pirates to find.
entries.thanks_1: Good job, let's go find more pirates.
entries.taunt_5: Prepare to be blown out of the sky.
entries.taunt_4: You are better then most Imperials but you are not good enough.
entries.taunt_3: Give up and I promise to make it quick.
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are out. Get them off of me!
entries.reason_5: Ready to go catch ourselves some pirate scum?
entries.reason_4: Stay alert! This place is crawling with pirates.
entries.reason_3: I don't think any pirate can resist this nice fat lure.
entries.reason_2: Let's see if Nym takes the bait.
entries.reason_1: Keep your eyes open for pirates.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Wait for the freighter at the arrival location.
entries.quest_location_d: Meet the freighters inside of the Lok system. You will receive a navigation waypoint to the arrival location of your assigned freighter once you reach the system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the freighter to it's destination. You must protect it from anyone who attempts to take it.
entries.panic_4: Nym's pirates decided to show up. How nice of them.
entries.panic_3: I hope you know how to fly that thing.
entries.panic_2: Boy, those guys look pretty mad.
entries.panic_1: Nym's pirates have taken the bait. Head's up.
entries.hull_half: I'm tracking multiple hull breaches! I can't take much more damage. Help!
entries.goodbye_5: We're going to head back to base. Another transport will meet you in a bit.
entries.goodbye_4: We're going to head back to base. Another transport will meet you in a bit.
entries.goodbye_3: We're going to head back to base. Another transport will meet you in a bit.
entries.goodbye_2: We're going to head back to base. Another transport will meet you in a bit.
entries.goodbye_1: We're going to head back to base. Another transport will meet you in a bit.
entries.found_loc: Travel to the rendezvous waypoint and wait for the fake transport to arrive.
entries.failed_protect: The transport has left the area prematurely! This mission is over.
entries.failed_destroy: The transports have been lost! The pilots on board have been lost! Return to base, this mission is over.
entries.complete: The ship has made it through the region. Cycle back and escort another fake transport through.
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Nym's pirates detected on attack vector! \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: The fake transport will arrive soon. Use it to bait Nym's pirates into attacking.
entries.abort: Abort code received. Heading back to base.
